title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1207.5 - Disbursal of moneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1207.5 - Disbursal of moneys

State Regulations

If the total of eligible training costs submitted for
reimbursement by local governments exceeds the amount appropriated for such
purpose by the State Legislature for any State fiscal year, the total of the
amount appropriated shall be disbursed on a pro rata basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1207.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
